== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Hirsute Hippo (21.04) for release in  <nowiki>[[https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/hirsute-hippo-release-schedule/18539 | April, 2021]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta''' pre-release, you can see what we are testing in preparation for our next version.

The Kubuntu team will be releasing 21.04 in April.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

Please '''report your results''' on the <nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker|Release tracker]]</nowiki>.

== Getting Kubuntu 21.04 Beta ==

=== Upgrading from 20.10 ===

To upgrade to a Kubuntu 21.04 pre-release, run '''sudo do-release-upgrade -d''' from a command line.

=== Download a Disk Image ===

Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/21.04/beta/|Bootable image]]</nowiki>. Direct downloads, torrents, and zysnc are available as options.

== New features and changes in 21.04 Beta ==
=== Core desktop and applications ===

==== Plasma 5.21: simple by default, powerful when needed ====

<nowiki>[[File:HirsutePlasma.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

'''Plasma 5''', the latest generation of KDE's desktop has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup.  The <nowiki>[[https://kde.org/announcements/plasma/5/5.21.0/|Plasma 5.21 series]]</nowiki> is the default in this version of Kubuntu.

<nowiki>[[https://kde.org/announcements/plasma/5/5.21.0/|Plasma 5.21]]</nowiki> has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup. Kubuntu beta ships the 3rd scheduled bugfix release of 5.21 (5.21.3). 

==== KDE Apps updates, including 20.12.3 release service and other updated apps ====

<nowiki>[[File:HirsuteApps.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

==== Web browser and office suite ====

* <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/87.0/releasenotes//|Firefox 87]]</nowiki> is the default browser 
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/ReleaseNotes/7.2|LibreOffice 7.2]]</nowiki> is provided by default in the full installation.

==== Qt ====

Kubuntu 21.04 Beta ships with Qt 5.15.2

=== Other new and updated applications ===
* Elisa 20.12.3 music player is now the default.
* Krita is updated to  4.4.3
* Kdevelop is updated to 5.6.2

== Other highlights/notes ==

=== Plasma Wayland session ===

* A Plasma Wayland session is installed, but is not the default. A Wayland session can be started by selecting it at the login screen. 

== Known issues ==

=== Installer and live session ===

* (Bug:1920665) The ubiquity installer may fail to start in a virtual machine, or on hardware where the ISO is booted in safe graphics mode.
* (Bug:1912327) Ubiquity crashed when selecting WiFi network - This can be worked around by booting to the full live session, and connecting to wifi via the sytem tray applet before launching the installer.
* (Bug:1916331) Cannot Select TimeZone at Install

* (Bug:1681144) Clicking on URLs in Kubuntu Installer Slideshow does nothing
* (Bug:1681830) Ubiquity installer - No Label shown for where to enter LVM Encryption Passwords fields
* (Bug:1706859) Auto-selected keyboard layout no longer matches chosen region on "Where are you" page

==== ZFS on root installer support ====

This was not implemented for the KDE front-end to the Ubiquity installer.
